alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 4:57AM PST until January 13 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Waves 3 to 5 feet. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
